attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: As a republican I was very exited to download this app in support of our great president Donald J. Trump. But sadly I’ve had it for a week now and I’ve had my many problems with the app. Here are my problems with the app. No matter where I go it is very laggy, it always crashes, the buttons don’t work, it’s attracted my neighborhood cockroaches, and my family has disowned me. So as you can see terrible app and I am deeply disappointed.

attributes.title: donny is a clown 🤡
attributes.review: i wanted to get the app to keep up with the AMAZING PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES but actually i was greatly disappointed because the app is garbage and only reminds me that the cheeto in office is only that, a cheeto. and i am greatly encouraging everyone to delete this clowns app 🤡🤡🤡 he is tricking everyone into thinking he is a smart man, when in reality he doesn’t know how to spell genius 😔😔😔 i am very upset and disappointed with the app and i will be promptly deleting it asap

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I thought this was gonna be a gOoD app from our AmaZinG president, but It asked for my credit card info right when I signed in I was confused then found out this app was to scam people. So if you consider downloading this app, DONT! unless you want someone to get a hold of your credit card info. And remove the opening screen because I’m now going to therapy after being traumatized after seeing the orange presidents’ face.🤮

attributes.title: Very Disappointing!
attributes.review:
This app is very disappointed it automatically asked for my credit card information and my phone number what does my credit card information have to do with news. And another thing I will not let this app generate user data from me and my family. 

It is taking your information and seeing how they can stop voters from voting this Cheeto dust president out of office.

attributes.title: not worth it🥱✨
attributes.review: this app not only made my phone glitch to point it shut down, but it also deleted everything off my phone and changed my background to a picture of trump tanning😳 and then i got a call📞 asking if my refrigerator was running and when i turned around it RAN AWAY🏃🏻‍♀️💨so when i went to go chase it i was RUN OVER BY A DINOSAUR🦖 it was terrifying and now i’m left with anxiety and ptsd🙈✨ I DO NOT RECCOMEND😔😔

attributes.title: Wow. I’m speechless
attributes.review: The person this app supports is a racist. He his a homophobe. He is an actual orange piece of crap. He is the president, sure. I’m sure he’s done good things for our economy. BUT. HE CANNOT STAY IN OFFICE. He will take away rights of people all around the country. He will take away the right for me to marry who I want. He will take away the right for me to adopt a child and for what? Christianity? We all know that bull anyway. I’m done and we all should be done with him.

attributes.title: Wow it’s just ... wow
attributes.review: So Tiffany told skylar who told Brittany who told Jessie who told The power rangers who told the groundhog outside of their base who told the Voldemort’s soul who told Heather D who told heather M who told Heather C who told Veronica who told the white rabbit who ran all the way to the queen of hearts castle to tell the king who told the queen who was gossiping with 5 of the seven dwarfs( 2 were busy ) who came from their dimension to ask me why there was a Cheeto in the White House and I said “Thank the boomers”

attributes.title: Buddy no❤️
attributes.review: Bro this app took so long to download and then I couldn’t even get into the app cause it kept crashing. Such a horrible app, it’s definitely not mom’s favorite, it kept on glitching. Some Fox News ads kept on popping up and I had to see that one dudes ugly face, made me vomit a little in my mouth, 10/10 would not recommend. I wish I could give this app a half a star. Maybe just not exist anymore❤️

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: hi, i just wanted to let everyone know NOT to get this app. it’s just absolute horrible and terrible. so i just got this app and i noticed that it started to hack my phone, like i would open my phone and the lock screen would be a new picyire of trump every single time. i was very stricken by this and had to delete it before it got access to all my information. dissapointing!!! do not get this app
